str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and ergazomai; to work fully, i.e. Accomplish; by implication, to finish, fashion.
From oregomai; properly, desire, i.e., violent passion (justifiable) abhorrence); by implication punishment.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Where, whither, when, in what place. Genitive case of hos as adverb; at which place, i.e. Where.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
Neither, nor, not even, and not. From ou and de; not however, i.e. Neither, nor, not even.
A transgression, overstepping, deviation. From parabaino; violation.
